Name: Breach Wanderers
About the game: Roguelite Collectible Card Game Play with Breach Wanderer’s unique deckbuilding system: before each run, you can customize your starting deck as well as the pool of cards that will be offered to you during the run. With over 700 cards to choose from, you will have plenty of options to find interesting combinations of cards. Your Choices Matter Every enemy in Breach Wanderers presents a different challenge and offers 2 unique card rewards. Choose your path carefully to build the best deck possible. With control over your character, your cards, and your path, you can never blame your luck for your misfortune. Choose Your Hero Breach Wanderer features 7 different characters who each bring something unique to the gameplay, through their 20 character cards and unique passive skills. While Silan creates a Cannon Blast every turn, Mirley prefers a subtler approach, using her cards to become Hidden and before backstabbing her foes. Every character is different, with their own strengths and weaknesses. Upgrade Your Town Gather resources in your adventures and use them to unlock new cards and upgrade your town. The Forge lets you purchase upgrades for your heroes, while the Market offers a new selection of wares every day. Unlock and upgrade the Shrine to enable additional challenges, if you’ve got what it takes! Strategic Gameplay Use your decks in challenging and difficult battles throughout your runs. Each turn, you will need to carefully balance your mana, your offense and your defense. You also have access to a plethora of buffs and debuffs, as well as special status bars such as Arcane, Frost and Shock, with powerful effects. Roadmap What can you expect from the full game? 10 playable characters, each suiting a different playstyle 6 dangerous areas to explore 5 buildings to customize and upgrade your town Over 1000 cards
